title: lakSmIkAnta bArO
sahitya:
lakSmIkAnta bArO shubha lakSaNavanta bArO pakSi vAhanavEridane vAmana mUrti bArO


caraNam 1    Adi mUla vigraha vinOdi nIne bArO sAdhu sajjana satya yOgi dAni nIne bArO
    caraNam 2    gADigAra krSNa ninna bEDi kombe bArO rUDa mAtanADi sarva rUDhigoDeya  bArO
    caraNam 3    ninna pAdangaLa nAnu baNNisi kareve bArO pannaga shayana purandara viTTala bArO
